allow: Bash(node -e "import(''url'').then(u => import(''path'').then(p => { const __filename = u.fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); const __dirname = p.dirname(__filename); const LOCAL_REGISTRY_PATH = p.resolve(__dirname, ''..'', ''..'', ''..'', ''registry''); console.log(''Current dir:'', __dirname); console.log(''LOCAL_REGISTRY_PATH:'', LOCAL_REGISTRY_PATH); }))")
